snippet: Jonathan Adams joined iCrossing, New York, part of the Hearst Corporation, in a new post, senior vice president of media for North America, leading the media practice.
lead_paragraph: Jonathan Adams joined iCrossing, New York, part of the Hearst Corporation, in a new post, senior vice president of media for North America, leading the media practice.
